headline.print_headline: Vine, the Short Video App,  Is Not Quite Shutting Down
headline.main: Vine, the Six-Second Video App, Is Not Quite Shutting Down

snippet: The app owned by Twitter will not survive but a new, pared-down version in January will allow users to share short videos to that social network....
lead_paragraph: The app owned by Twitter will not survive but a new, pared-down version in January will allow users to share short videos to that social network.
